p: The plant Symplocos racemosa bark was procured from a local pansari market of Ram Bagh, near Hall Gate, Amritsar, Punjab (India); which has been identified and submitted to the Herbarium of the Department of Botanical and Environmental Sciences, Guru Nanak Dev University (Amritsar), India, with an accession no. 766â€“768 Bot.& Env. Sc. dated 02/07/15. Surface sterilization of the plant material was performed as described earlier in Sood et al. [ 15].
